text:
Jargon (https://jargon.com) | Senior Engineer | Seattle | Onsite | Full-time

At Jargon, we seek to make the world smaller by removing conversational language barriers.

While we're a young company, we're already live with our initial pilot customers, and have an exciting summer ahead of us.

We're looking for our first hire to help out on all portions of our stack. Please see https://angel.co/jargon-com/jobs/388816-senior-software-engi... for details, or shoot me an email.

Jonathan - Founder & CTO

jonathan /at/ jargon.com
